CMX Summit 2022: Thrive | CMX Connect, powered by Bevy ]]></title><link>https://events.cmxhub.com/events/details/cmx-cmx-hq-presents-cmx-summit-2022-thrive/</link><description><img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/startup-grind/image/upload/c_fill,dpr_2.0,f_auto,g_center,h_1080,q_100,w_1080/v1/gcs/platform-data-cmx/events/Thumbnail%201080x1080%20%283%29_gzIwoM3.png" /><br/><![CDATA[ We are excited to officially welcome you to CMX Summit 2022! From Tuesday, September 13 - Thursday, September 15, get ready for three jam-packed days of speakers, hands-on workshops, and networking with the world’s largest group of community builders — all the content you need to build flourishing communities.

This year’s theme for CMX Summit is Thrive. Last year we recognized the rise of the community industry, and this year, we want to continue that trajectory for community professionals to learn the tools and skill sets needed to have a prosperous community.
